info.name: Murray Smith
info.description: I'm a percolative propellorhead and curious, focused problem-solver. My talent is learning, and my passion is building web applications and tools.

about.description: I've got a keen, practical, and deeply creative spirit, which makes me a born problem solver, and a lover of philosophy.

about.name: Hobby Electronics
about.description: I enjoy circuit design and theory—not to mention soldering, fiddling with componentry, and repairing electronics.

about.name: Film Production
about.description: I'm an internationally-exhibited filmmaker, a grant recipient, and have experience in all film departments from scriptwriting through to visual effects.

about.name: Athletics
about.description: I'm an avid (and competitive) squash player, a casual ultimate / dodgeball / volleyball player, and an all around athlete.

experience.name: Business Instincts Group

experience.description: Oversee the shipping and receiving of all film prints at annual festival. Calmly handle any time-sensitive (and notoriously unpredictable) issues that arise.
